article_title: Obama on Selfies: Shake My Hand Instead
article_text:

twitter.description:
President Barack Obama has issued an executive order: no more selfies.
Speaking to supporters at the Hoogland Center for the Arts in Springfield, Ill. on Wednesday, the President started by telling...
twitter.title: Obama on Selfies: The Snaps Stop Here

article_metadata.description: President Barack Obama says he really doesn't like selfies, and has decided against taking such pictures. He just wants to shake hands.
